lom:description.lom:string: Starting from January 14, 2002, The Engineering Management Department of Missouri University of Science and Technology had organized graduate seminars every Monday from 2:30 to 3:30 CST. The seminars were held at the Library Room G11 and they were open to the Systems Engineering and Distance Engineering Management students. The seminars were broadcasted live over the internet and links to the archived videos of the seminars are available from this page." Most of talks include an abstract and video clips in RealPlayer.

lom:title.lom:string: Online Graduate Seminars in Engineering Management at Missouri University of Science and Technology
